mapper.insert: insert into lg_driver (driverId, driverName, idCard, gender, nativePlace, birthday, phone, address, entryTime, departureTime, affiliatedCompanyId, driverStatus, remarks, idCardPicture, driverLicensePicture, fromLicensePicture, remarks1, remarks2 ) values (#{driverid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{drivername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gender,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{nativeplace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entrytime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{departuretime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{affiliatedcompanyid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{driverstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idcardpicture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{driverlicensepicture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fromlicensepicture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update lg_driver set driverName = #{drivername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, idCard = #{idcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gender = #{gender,jdbcType=CHAR}, nativePlace = #{nativeplace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, entryTime = #{entrytime,jdbcType=DATE}, departureTime = #{departuretime,jdbcType=DATE}, affiliatedCompanyId = #{affiliatedcompanyid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, driverStatus = #{driverstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, idCardPicture = #{idcardpicture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, driverLicensePicture = #{driverlicensepicture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fromLicensePicture = #{fromlicensepicture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks1 = #{remarks1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks2 = #{remarks2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where driverId = #{driverid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select driverId, driverName, idCard, gender, nativePlace, birthday, phone, address, entryTime, departureTime, affiliatedCompanyId, driverStatus, remarks, idCardPicture, driverLicensePicture, fromLicensePicture, remarks1, remarks2 from lg_driver where driverId = #{driverid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select driverId, driverName, idCard, gender, nativePlace, birthday, phone, address, entryTime, departureTime, affiliatedCompanyId, driverStatus, remarks, idCardPicture, driverLicensePicture, fromLicensePicture, remarks1, remarks2 from lg_driver
